title: Amazing Spiderman 2 for iPod/iPad/iPod (ipa)
description:
Description
*IMPORTANT* The Amazing Spider-Man 2 requires an iPad 2 (or newer), iPhone 4s (or newer), or iPod touch 5th Generation. An internet connection is required to play.

Become the Amazing Spider-Man in this open-world adventure full of non-stop action, and face the web-slingerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s greatest challenge yet!

New York is under threat from a city-wide gang war and only Spider-Man can stop it! Standing in his way are Electro and other nefarious villains. Can Spider-Man restore order and safety to the Big Apple?!

THE OFFICIAL GAME OF THE AMAZING SPIDER-MAN 2 MOVIE 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Web-sling, wall-climb and web-shoot as the fast and quick-witted Spider-Man! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ An original story expands on the highly anticipated blockbuster film!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Go beyond the film with new characters such as Black Cat and Screwball.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Unlock Spider-Man suits such as Symbiote Spider-Man and Iron Spider-Man! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Face off against famous villains such as Venom, the Green Goblin, Electro, and Kraven the Hunter!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ High-quality voice acting and cinematic cutscenes bring the movie experience to life!

CUTTING-EDGE EXPERIENCE
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Intense combo-focused combat! Defeat Spider-ManÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s greatest enemies Ã¢â‚¬â€œ from street thugs to super villains Ã¢â‚¬â€œ with crazy acrobatic fighting styles!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Swing free through the city like never before, thanks to high-quality, fluid animations!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Take the fight to the sky with action-packed aerial combat!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Unleash devastating combos through enhanced icon controls for an intense action experience!

MASSIVE ENHANCEMENTS TO THE ULTIMATE PLAYGROUND
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adventure in a larger open-world Manhattan with 6 detailed districts to explore, from the bustling Times Square to picturesque Central Park!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Console-like graphics offer a bigger, better, and more beautiful experience.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A deeper story takes you on an exciting adventure, showcasing 6 legendary villains and an expanded set of side missions! 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Spectacular social events, including battling waves of bosses and opponents in MysterioÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Arena!
